p: In addition, the cyclooxygenase (COX-2) inhibitory activities of these new compounds were evaluated using the in vitro assay kit [ 10]. Interestingly, the similar results were observed as those of NO production inhibition assay, only compounds 3 and 5 showed COX-2 inhibitory activities with IC 50 values at 30.1 and 42.3 μM, compared to that of positive control naproxen (IC 50 = 8.2 μM).
